CULFf238.First Lines:
Kepe thy syght fro vanyteThat þu noght coueyte þat euell
                    may be…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…These ben the wyttys fyueThat cysten men schoulden reule in
                    lyue
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
Kepe thy sight fro vaniteThat þu coveite not þat evil may
                    be…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…Theis bene þe wittis fyveThat cristyn men schulde Rule
                    in lyve
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title: Thes be the v wittes bodely (f. 107); The v wittes bodely (RT)

BLHar1706.First Lines: Kepe þi syȝte fro vanyteThat þou not couyte þat yuel may be…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …þise ben þe wyttys fyueThat crysten men schulde rewle in lyue
BLHar1706.Note: Latin terms for five bodily senses written in rubric in outer margins beside first line relating to each.
BLHar1706.Attributed Title: Quinque sensus corporaliter (rubric preceding first line (f. 207v)
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.

BLHar2339.First Lines:
Kepe þi siȝt fro vanyteeÞat þu not coueite
                    þat yuel mai be…
BLHar2339.Last Lines:
…Þese ben þe wittis fyueÞat cristen men
                    schulden rule in lyue
BLHar2339.Attributed Title: Þese ben þi fyue bodily wittis (rubricated, f. 121)

Lam491.First Lines:
Kepe þi syght fro vanityþat þu not couet þat il
                    may be…
Lam491.Last Lines:
…Þise ben þo wyttes fyveþat rulen al crysten
                    men on lyve
Lam491.Editions:
Bülbring,  Karl Daniel. 
             “über die Handschrift Nr. 491 der Lambeth-Bibliothek.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         86 (1891): 383-92: 388.

Ushaw28.First Lines:
Kepe þi sight frome vanyteÞat þu not couet þat
                    wel mey be…
Ushaw28.Last Lines:
…þies been þi wittes fyueþat cristen men shulde
                    rewle in lyue
Ushaw28.Note:
In the Speculum Christiani, Terci Tabula, with headings
                        Visus, Auditus, Odoratus, Gustus, Tactus.

Bülbring,  Karl Daniel. 
             “über die Handschrift Nr. 491 der Lambeth-Bibliothek.”
